lims_utils.lims_utils module¶

A module with lims help functions.

Maya Brandi, Science for Life Laboratory, Stockholm, Sweden.

lims_utils.lims_utils.get_run_qcs(fc, lanesobj)[source]¶
lims_utils.lims_utils.get_sequencing_info(fc)[source]¶

Input: a process object ‘fc’, of type ‘Illumina Sequencing (Illumina SBS) 4.0’, Output: A dictionary where keys are lanes 1,2,...,8, and values are lane artifact udfs

lims_utils.lims_utils.make_sample_artifact_maps(sample_name)[source]¶

outin: connects each out_art for a specific sample to its corresponding in_art and process. one-one relation

lims_utils.lims_utils.procHistory(proc, samplename)[source]¶

Quick wat to get the ids of parent processes from the given process, while staying in a sample scope
